input.activity_signal: Multiple active signals found: 1) Company profile on Cortera business directory showing current operations in Nashville, TN specializing in "Telephone Communications, Except Radiotelephone" 2) Recent contract awards including Prince George's County Public Schools E-Rate hosted VoIP contract (exp. 6-30-16 but shows recent vendor selection) 3) Active marketing materials showing "ENA SmartVoice" cloud-based VoIP solution from Alabama Community College System documentation 4) Listed as active provider offering "Network monitoring", "SIP trunking", and "Managed IT services" in State of Utah telecommunications services documentation
input.product_summary: ENA Services provides cloud-based VoIP and unified communications solutions including their "ENA SmartVoice" platform, SIP trunking services, and managed IT services primarily targeting educational institutions and government entities.
